description: This course provides students with an opportunity to develop an in-depth understanding of the principles of strength training and conditioning, including anatomical and physiological considerations, lifting techniques, equipment selection, program development/evaluation, and weightlifting safety; thus enabling them to teach and train others. This course is for exercise science majors only.
name: Prin of Strength & Fitness Training
notes: For rising senior and junior Exercise Science majors only.
Permission of the instructor required to register.
Permission of the instructor required to register.

For Exercise Science majors only. Not open to sophomore or first-year students.
Permission of the instructor required to register.

title: Principles of Strength and Fitness Training
